item.title: TX-601 Spur East - Exit 22
item.description: TX-601 Spur east at Exit 22 - Sargent Major Blvd./Airport Road.

item.title: TX-601 Spur East - Exit 21
item.description: TX-601 Spur east at Exit 21 - Chaffee/Fred Wilson.

item.title: TX-601 Spur East Approaching Exits 21 and 22
item.description: TX-601 Spur east approaching Exit 21 - Chaffee/Fred Wilson and Exit 22 - Airport Road/Sargent Major Blvd. Use Exit 21 for Fort Bliss National Cemetery.

item.title: US-54 North at TX-601 Spur
item.description: US-54 north at TX-601 Spur onramp. There is a freeway to freeway connection between US-54 and TX-601, but the author took the ramp from US-54 to a surface street which turns into TX-601.

item.title: US-54 North - Exit 24B
item.description: US-54 north approaching Exit 24B - TX-601 Spur East. Use TX-601 Spur for the El Paso International Airport.
